H0.text: Daman Albarn, Graham Coxon,Alex James and Dave Rowntree form or formed which band. Oasis

H1.text: Daman Albarn, Graham Coxon,Alex James and Dave Rowntree form or formed which band. Pulp

H2.text: Daman Albarn, Graham Coxon,Alex James and Dave Rowntree form or formed which band. Radiohead

H3.text: Daman Albarn, Graham Coxon,Alex James and Dave Rowntree form or formed which band. BLUR

A4.text: Blur are an English rock band formed in London in 1988, consisting of singer Damon Albarn, guitarist Graham Coxon, bassist Alex James, and drummer Dave Rowntree.
